amendment.description: To provide for the reinstatement of the license for the Gibson Dam project.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3020 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3020 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Daines to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S325-326; text: CR S326) To provide for the reinstatement of the license for the Gibson Dam project.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3020 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3020 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Daines to Amendment SA 2953.
